name: Tone Friends (Feng Pan)
description:
Press the right tone key to make more friends. 

Friends will provide more keys for you.

The more friends you make, the more complicated your life goes.

Besides mouse/touch control, you can use keyboard as well.

Keyboard instructions:

ASDFGHJK = “Do”, “Re”, “Mi”, “Fa”, “So”, “La”, “Ti”, “Do+”

W = “#Do”

E = “#Re”

T = “#Fa”

Y = “#So”

U = “#La”
